price: ߊ߬ ߕߎ߲߬ ߓߊ߯ ߒ߬ ߘߌߦߊ߫߸ ߊ߲ ߕߘߍ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߖߊ߬ߛߙߋ߬ߡߊ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ ߟߊߥߟߌ߬ ߛߏ ߓߍ߯ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَبَعَثۡنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرۡيَةٖ نَّذِيرٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaw shi'nā labaʿathnā fī kulli qaryatin nadhīran
